name: inventory-target
title: InventoryTarget
description: Specifications of characteristics of dwc:Organisms that were included or excluded in an Inventory.

fields.name: inventoryTargetID
fields.description: The identifier for the InventoryTarget instance to which the InventoryAbundance refers.

fields.name: inventoryID
fields.description: The identifier for the Inventory (a dwc:Event).

fields.name: inventoryTargetType
fields.description: The type of scope the InventoryTarget describes.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: inventoryTargetTypeIRI
fields.description: The IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for the inventoryTargetType.

fields.name: inventoryTargetTypeVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definitions of values for inventoryTargetType are given.

fields.name: inventoryTargetValue
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: inventoryTargetValueIRI
fields.description: The IRI for the value of the inventoryTargetValue

fields.name: inventoryTargetValueVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definitions of values for inventoryTargetValue are given.

fields.name: inventoryTargetUnit
fields.description: The value of the unit for the inventoryTargetValue.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: inventoryTargetUnitIRI
fields.description: The IRI for the units of the inventoryTargetValue

fields.name: inventoryTargetUnitVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definitions of values for inventoryTargetUnit are given.

fields.name: includeOrExclude
fields.description: A term to declare whether the instance of the InventoryTarget is an included scope or an excluded scope. Combinations of InventoryTarget records of inclusions and exclusions can define complex scopes such as all 'Aves' except 'Passeriformes'.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is use a controlled vocabulary consisting of 'include' and 'exclude' only.

fields.name: isInventoryTargetFullyReported
fields.description: A declaration of whether the counts for the instance of the InventoryTarget report everything that matches the declared InventoryTarget. If they do, this enables inference of absence of detection for everything in that InventoryTarget that is included but that does not appear in the count.
